resources.string: Access to the camera is required. Please grant the corresponding permission.

Anyline is the leading text recognition SDK for your mobile device.
You can embed Anyline in your own mobile application and digitize and scan all kinds of texts, codes and numbers.

This app shows a few things that already work and gives ideas about what you can adjust!
Congratulations! You did your first scan!
We ran out of trophies, good job!
Whoop whoop! 30 scans? Look at you!
Half of 100 scans? You\'re on a roll!
20 more scans and we are done!
The required barcode API is not available.\nSimultaneous barcode scanning will not work.
Anyline needs the permission to access the camera in order to scan.
Your request was successful - check your mails!
Click here to get an introduction
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
Anyline OCR is able to scan barcodes simultaneously. This feature will only work if the newest Google Play services are installed.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
All entries in this list will be deleted.
Document is not sharp. Please hold the camera steadily and ensure the document is in focus
Document is skewed. Place the camera directly above the document
The image is too dark. Please ensure there is enough light
Scanning full document. Please hold still
You can download a bundle of sample images directly to your phone or get it via email!
Note that it may be difficult to scan and display the samples simultaneously from the same device ;)
Scan analog or digital meters with this mode. It doesnt matter how many digits, or if the analog meter has a black or white background.
Scan all sorts of analog energy meters with this mode. It doesnt matter how many digits or if there is a black or white background.
Hint: The \"Barcode Detection\" allows to simultaneously scan the meter identifier.

The barcode reader is currently supporting:\nUPC A, UPC E, EAN-8, EAN-13, EAN-14, EAN-18, EAN-99, EAN-128, Identcode, Leitcode, ISBN-13, ISBN-10, ISSN, ISMN, ITF-14, Data matrix, Aztec (limited), Codabar, QR code
Scan dial meters with this mode. Please only put relevant dials in the cutout in order to get the correct result.
For scanning License Plate Numbers from cars.
Hint: You can use the MRZ scanner in portrait or landscape mode.
Choose the background color of the meter (black or white), by choosing the buttons on the left or the right side.\nThis mode recognizes meters with 6 or 7 pre-decimal digits.
Choose the background color of the meter (black or white), by choosing the buttons on the left or the right side.
Choose the correct number of pre-decimal digits you want to scan by clicking on the "minus" or "plus" symbol.
Scan serial numbers with this mode. Please only put relevant numbers in the cutout in order to get the correct result.
That is basically all you need to know - now give it a try!
See more details on Google Books
Could not load web page. Maybe you have no internet connection?

Don\'t hesitate to simply reach out via the live chat while scanning or - if you need additional support - simply share your email address with us, and we\'ll have a team member get back to you right away.

The reporting of results in the Community Edition, including the photo of a scanned item, helps us improve our product and the customer experience. Results and images of the MRZ, Barcode, and Document modules are NOT reported in any case.
This will clear all of the data you have generated whilst using the app.

Note: we cannot guarantee the suggested words to be valid Scrabble words.
Only english words are considered.
Therefore special characters like German Umlaute are simply ignored.
Blank fields are not taken into account.
The calculated points are related to the English-Scrabble version as well.
Sorry, no words have been found!
Please confirm you data before sending.
I, %1$s, hereby declare that the data above is complete and correct.
Your reading is outside the expected range. Please confirm that this value is correct: %1$s kWh
We have received your meter reading. Thank you!
Great, we will now try to send you the samples!
Sorry, but we could not send you the samples. Please download it directly from the website.
You want to try out all scan modes but you dont have a digital meter at home or any scrabble letters in your pocket? No problem!

These two modes not only allow you to scan, but also show potential process implementations in utilities. In order to see the processes in action, please download the Anyline Scan Samples by entering your email. Enjoy the full Anyline Experience!
